subject: Dear friend,
body:
Dear friend,
I am the financial manager of Bank of Korea. My name is Kun Woo Hyun . I have a sensitive and private offer from the top executive to seek your partnership in re-profiling some offshore investment funds worth 11.5M U.S.D (Eleven Million five hundred thousand United States Dollars) I am constrained however to withhold most of the details for now. This is a legitimate transaction.
 If we agree on the terms you will be given 20% of the total funds, if you are interested please write back via email providing me your personal details and phone number for further directives.
If you are interested and willing to render your assistance please respond via my private email address stated below.
 I look forward to your response.
Best regards
Kun Woo Hyun
Email:kun_woohyun1@hotmail.com

subject: Re: Dear friend,
body:
Hello Kun Woo Hyun,

I hope this message finds you well. Your offer sounds intriguing and I'm curious to learn more about it. Could you please provide me with more details? What kind of investment are we talking about here? And what would be my role in this?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Jennifer
